GSD.vulnerability_type: Reliance on improperly secured communications channel (Discord)
GSD.affected_component: Discord community "announcement" channels for multiple NFTs
GSD.impact: access Grape Network tokens was used to send Discord server messages resulting in social engineering of access to crypto wallets resulting in $1.3 Million USD (Monkey Kingdom) and $150,000 USD (Fractal) in stolen funds
GSD.notes: This issue also relies on unsafe usage of Discord/webhooks and users attaching wallets to other services that can then access and remove funds.
GSD.description: In Grape Network Grape Network version unknown a Reliance on improperly secured communications channel (Discord) exists in the Discord community "announcement" channels for multiple NFTs that can be attacked via unknown resulting in access Grape Network tokens was used to send Discord server messages resulting in social engineering of access to crypto wallets resulting in $1.3 Million USD (Monkey Kingdom) and $150,000 USD (Fractal) in stolen funds

OSV.summary: Reliance on improperly secured communications channel (Discord) in Grape Network version unknown
